title: Pet Friendly Community! We welcome your furry friends!
posting_body: ['-- Scarlett Place --', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1382', 'Apartment:', '1 Bedroom | 1 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '722 sq ft', 'Welcome to Scarlett Place, a residential community featuring One, Two & Three bedroom apartments in Jonesboro, GA.', 'Spacious layouts and amenities welcome you home, along with exceptional service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options.', 'Are you looking for an apartment for rent in Jonesboro, GA?', 'Contact our friendly, professional office staff to schedule a tour today.', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '− Controlled Access', '− Fitness Center', '− Gated Community', '− Parking', '− Picnic Area', '− Pool', '− Business Center', '− Double Vanity', '− Garages', '− Garden Tubs', '− Maintenance on site', '− Multi Use Room', '− Online Services', '− Property Manager on Site', '− Public Transportation', '− Sundeck', 'Apartment features include:', '− Air Conditioning', '− Cable Ready', '− Carpeting', '− Dining Room', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Kitchen', '− Oven', '− Patio/Balcony', '− Range', '− All-Electric GE Appliances', '− Breakfast Bar', '− Cable/Satellite Available', '− Deck', '− Double Vanities', '− Hardwood Floors', '− Track Lighting', '− Trash Compactor', '− Vaulted Ceilings', '− Walk-In Closets', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', '3500 Summercourt Dr', 'Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '562B8D6B88794A78']
